nodes.text: A Quarren male owned an HCT-2001 Dragonboat-class freighter parked in the Galactic City on Coruscant around 21 BBY, during the Clone Wars.

After escaping from the Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center, bounty hunters Cad Bane and Moralo Eval, along with Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi disguised as Rako Hardeen, stole this Quarren's ship to escape from Coruscant. However, the Quarren was looking at his datapad and noticed his ship was getting hijacked a few seconds after takeoff.
